Class HelperClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • HelperClass

  • public class HelperClass
extends java.lang.Object
    HelperClass is a retrieval class meant to assist with retrieving records from a database and converting them into ArrayLists.

    IMPORTANT This class has not been modified to allow multithreading. Your pulls may be incomplete if this gets interupted and the PreparedStatement connection gets closed.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    %I%, %G%

    • Constructor Detail

      • HelperClass

        public HelperClass(DB db)
        Creates an instance of the HelperClass with DB.

        Any method calls after instantiation will: 1. Creates a PreparedStatement of the query 2. Execute the query 3. Convert to ArrayList of Strings 4. Close the connection 5. Return the ArrayList

        This order ensures simplicity and manages possible memory leaks from the PreparedStatement connection.

        Parameters:
        db - A previously establish DB object
        See Also:
        DB

    • Method Detail

      • getRecords

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getRecords(java.lang.String absTablePath)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns all records from the specified database.table in column 2 as ArrayList of type String.
        Parameters:
        absTablePath - The absolute database.table path to requested
        Returns:
        ArrayList An ArrayList of Strings of all records in the table of the specified path
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • getDistinct

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDistinct(java.lang.String absTablePath,
                                                java.lang.String column)
                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns ArrayList of type String of distinct values in table and column specified.
        Parameters:
        absoTablePath - The absolute database.table path
        column - The column header for the row returned as distinct
        Returns:
        ArrayList An array of distinct records in column
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
